name: Cucumber Caprese Salad
author: Kim
summary: An easy and delicious layered-style cucumber caprese salad that makes for a beautiful presentation!
ingredients: 2 large Roma tomatoes, sliced into 1/4-inch-thick rounds
1 large cucumber, peeled and sliced into 1/4-inch-thick rounds
1 (8 ounce) package sliced fresh mozzarella cheese
salt and ground black pepper to taste
directions: Bring balsamic vinegar to a boil in a small saucepan over medium heat
Boil until reduced to 1/4 cup, about 8 minutes
Remove from heat and allow to cool to room temperature
Arrange tomatoes, cucumber, mozzarella slices, and basil leaves in an alternating pattern on a small serving platter until platter is covered
Drizzle olive oil over the salad
Drizzle 1 to 2 tablespoons of the cooled balsamic vinegar on top
